address: Xã Đại Sơn, Huyện Văn Yên, Tỉnh Yên Bái
thought:
**My Analysis of the Administrative Unit Change**

Okay, so I'm presented with an address: "Xã Đại Sơn, Huyện Văn Yên, Tỉnh Yên Bái," and my task is to determine its current administrative status.  The user is giving me a starting point, so I'll go through the relevant documents.

First, I need to pinpoint the specifics of the original address.  We have "Xã Đại Sơn," which is the ward, and "Tỉnh Yên Bái," the province.  Got it.  

Now, I understand that administrative boundaries can change.  The user hasn't specified exactly what kind of changes have happened, so I will analyze this information.  I'll start with the province resolutions to see if "Tỉnh Yên Bái" has undergone any changes.  It looks like Resolution 60-NQ/TW states that Yên Bái merged with Lào Cai to form Lào Cai province. That's a key piece of information!

Next, I'll shift my focus to finding "Xã Đại Sơn" in the relevant resolutions.  Remembering the province change, I'll be looking in the context of Lào Cai now. I will review the other resolutions and new wards list to find the matching ward.

I'll start by checking the "Other Resolutions" list to identify any changes that may have happened. I will run through each of the options, carefully looking for any mention of a ward called "Xã Đại Sơn". I'll be sure to make sure I do not have a case that is not pertinent.

After carefully reviewing the resolutions, it looks like resolution 1673/NQ-UBTVQH15, the one related to Lào Cai province, may be a possible match. It indicates that "Xã Đại Sơn" combined with a couple of other areas. It seems like the new ward will be called "Xã Tân Hợp".

citation.header: 1673/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Lào Cai
citation.line: 19. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Đại Sơn, Nà Hẩu và Tân Hợp thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Tân Hợp.
